arStrings.szText: Casting {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} always spawns an additional {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} and increases your damage with {c_important}Shock{/c} Skills by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds
{c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} spawns an additional one and increases {c_important}Shock{/c} Skill damage.
